title: Image Downloader
description: A simple tool to download multiple images at once

imageDownloader.title: Image Downloader
imageDownloader.description: Enter image URLs below to download them in batch
imageDownloader.placeholder:
Enter image URLs (one per line or comma-separated)
Example:
https://example.com/image1.jpg
https://example.com/image2.png, https://example.com/image3.jpg
imageDownloader.noUrls: No URLs found. Please enter at least one valid image URL
